channel.title: Swap, Proxmox, Linux on Alex' KB

item.title: Fix Exceeding Swapping on a Small Proxmox Server
item.description: I have a small server at home with little specs but great ideas. Now that I am using more containers and assigned more RAM to them than I got, Swapping got to a level of 42.2%. And that’s not good. So I fixed it.
